Analyte(s): Fractional NO concentration in expired breath (FeNO)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Personal computer (PC) with NIOX® Panel software
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NIOX® Panel software accessory enabling additional PC display and control of the NIOX MINO® Airway Inflammation Monitor for breath nitric oxide measurement.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative, non-invasive measurement of nitric oxide in expired breath to monitor asthma patients’ response to anti-inflammatory therapy as an adjunct to established clinical and laboratory assessments; suitable for children ages 7-17 and adults 18+, not for infants or critical care use.
